select count(*) from help as a left join member as b on a.no = b.no
and b.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and htitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or hcontent like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select b.nickname, hno, b.no, htitle, hcontent, hdate, b.email, recontent from help as a left join member as b on a.no = b.no where hno
and b.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and htitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or hcontent like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY hno desc LIMIT #{startRow}, 3;
select hno, b.no, htitle, hcontent, hdate from help as a left join member as b on a.no = b.no where hno=#{hno}
